plugin.desc: Automatically makes all third party plugin repositories that are listed on the Logitech wiki site available through Extension Downloader. The plugin doesn't actually read the wiki page directly since that would open up a security hole, instead it reads the repositories from a list available on the lms-autorepo GitHub project. New repostories added to the wiki page will be added after they have been checked so they provide serious plugins and not spam urls. plugin.name: TrackStat
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson
plugin.changes: - Added support for SqueezeCenter 7.4 - Corrected so internet meta data is shown correctly on Now Playing screen if one of the TRACKSTAT title formats is used - Added possibility to request parameters from top rated albums and most played album playlist templates for SQL Playlist - Added predefiend SQL Playlist playlists for playing top rated or most played albums in a genre, artist or year - Improved logic releated to finding moved tracks on multi disk albums when a TrackStat backup is restored
plugin.desc: Store statistics such as rating, last played time and play counts so it survives a rescan and allows to to browse your library based on the statistic information. You can set the ratings via the Squeezebox player, CLI, Squeezebox Controller or web interface, ratings and statistic data can also be imported/exported from/to iTunes, Amarok and MusicIP Mixer. It also supports Dynamic Playlist plugin by adding dynamic playlists for all its statistics. Please note that TrackStat needs a bit more resources than small plugins and might also slow down startup of SqueezeCenter a bit, so you might get problems if you are running SqueezeCenter on slow hardware. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.title: TrackStat

plugin.desc: Makes it possible to customize the structure, contents and sorting of the browse menus on the Squeezebox. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)

plugin.desc: Export your music library as a Docset to be used with Dash (http://kapeli.com/dash). This allows you to quickly search your library on your Mac computer without firing up the Logitech Media Server web UI.
plugin.title: Create docsets for Dash

plugin.name: ImageProxy
plugin.creator: Michael Herger
plugin.changes: v1.1.0: Add option to add headers for external image proxies; improve daemon monitoring.
plugin.desc: Allows you to configure external image proxies to be used by LMS. Offload the heavy image processing to an external service.
plugin.title: Image Proxy configuration helper

plugin.name: LastMix
plugin.creator: Michael Herger
plugin.changes: v2.3.0 - Improve tag mixing by getting more tracks to pick from, and balanced shuffle.
plugin.desc: LastMix allows you to create Last.fm based mixes for the "Don't Stop The Music" plugin.
plugin.title: LastMix - Don't Stop The Music support using Last.fm.

plugin.name: MusicArtistInfo

plugin.desc: Read album reviews, artist biographies, related artists, song lyrics, see artist pictures and much more.
plugin.title: Music and Artist Information

plugin.name: MusicInfoSCR

plugin.desc: The Music Information Screen plugin allows customization of the player's Now Playing screen and other elements.
Das Musik-Informations Plugin erlaubt es, den Bildschirm weitgehend selber zu gestalten.
plugin.title: Music Information Screen

plugin.name: NoSetup

plugin.desc: This plugins allows you to disable access to the settings pages from the Squeezebox Server's web interface.
Mit diesem Plugin können Sie die Einstellungsseiten des Squeezebox Servers ausblenden.

Einstellungen aus-/einblenden

plugin.name: WalkWithMe
plugin.creator: Michael Herger
plugin.changes: 1.1.0: add option to grab a playlist form another player, rather than pushing it; try to improve behaviour when moving a RandomPlay list. v1.1.1: add CLI support. v1.1.2: improved French translation. v1.1.3: sort players by name
plugin.desc: Continue your listening on a different player - easily.
Einfach die aktuelle Wiedergabeliste auf einem anderen Gerät weiterspielen.
plugin.title: Music Walk With Me
Musik marschier mit mir

plugin.name: LazySearch2
plugin.creator: Stuart Hickinbottom
plugin.desc: Lazy Search Music is a plugin that lets you search for music without having to multi-tap each letter in the search text you're after, and displays search results "as you type". This plugin works with Squeezeboxes and Transporters when using a remote control featuring number keys, and doesn't affect the operation of the Controller.
plugin.title: LazySearch2

plugin.name: AutoRescan
plugin.creator: Stuart Hickinbottom
plugin.desc: AutoRescan is a plugin that will detect changes to your music folder and will automatically trigger a rescan if any files have been added, removed or changed. This means changes to appear in your music library automatically. Note that Windows users need to be running a 'source code' version of Squeezebox Server under ActivePerl - see the plugin website for further details.
plugin.title: AutoRescan

plugin.name: SugarCube
plugin.creator: Charles Parker
plugin.desc: Travel through your music Library using MusicIPs recommendations. Features Include Filter, Genre, Artist and Recipe Mixing, Trackstat Integration, Artist Blocking, Genre Blocking, Custom Track Weighting Routines, Coming Up Next Display, Sleep Mode, Volume Fade and lots more. See www.spicefly.com for Details and Change Log.
plugin.title: Spicefly SugarCube
